DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the evolution of the impact on daily life activities over the first 12 months following the introduction of interferon beta-1b treatment in patients presenting RRMS or patients at high risk of developing Multiple Sclerosis after a first clinical demyelinating event
DOC.brief_title: Open, Multicentric, Prospective, Quality of Life Study in Multiple Sclerosis Patients
DOC.criteria: Males or females aged 18 years or over, having received a confirmed diagnosis of RRMS as defined by the MacDonald or Poser criteria or after a first clinical demyelinating event suggestive of Multiple Sclerosis, and meeting the requirements of the study inclusion criteria The choice of treatment must be clearly dissociated from the decision to include the patient in the study.
